business.headline: 63% of households aware, yet only 9.5% invest in markets, Sebi survey showsDespite growing awareness about investing in the markets, the latest Sebi survey shows that only a small fraction of households, i.e., just 9.5%, are actively investing.

In Balochistan, where Dussehra was once homeDussehra in Balochistan (A province in Pakistan) – this may seem unreal now, but in the 1920s, during colonial rule, the region witnessed the burning of Ravana's effigies year after year. The popular festival brought the Hindu community together in a spirit of cohesiveness. It wasn't just Balochistan. Records show that Dussehra was celebrated widely in other parts of present-day Pakistan too. From Lahore to Sindh, the festival was popular and vibrant. Let's take a dive into this once-popular tradition in the history of Balochistan.
